name: write_component_code
description: FINAL STEP: Write the complete HTML/CSS/JS code for all component variations. YOU MUST provide complete, working code for each variation. Each component must be self-contained and ready to preview in a browser. This is the termination tool - call this only when you have all variations ready.

components.description: Array of 2-4 complete component variations, each with full HTML/CSS/JS code

variation_name.description: Name of this variation (matches the plan)

html_code.description: REQUIRED: Complete, self-contained HTML document. Must include: <!DOCTYPE html>, <html>, <head> with <style> tag for all CSS, <body> with component markup, and <script> tag for any JavaScript. Must be production-ready and work in all modern browsers. Aim for 2000-5000 characters. Make it responsive and accessible. Use semantic HTML.

description.description: Brief description of this variation's unique features (1-2 sentences)

usage_notes.description: Brief notes on how to use these components, any customization options, or integration tips (optional)
